events.title: React Conference 2025
events.description: Join us for the biggest React conference of the year! Learn about the latest React features, best practices, and network with fellow developers from around the world.

events.title: JavaScript Workshop
events.description: Learn advanced JavaScript techniques and best practices in this intensive hands-on workshop. Topics include ES6+, async/await, closures, and modern JavaScript patterns.

events.title: Web Development Bootcamp
events.description: Intensive bootcamp covering modern web development technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database management.

events.title: Full-Stack Developer Summit
events.description: A comprehensive summit for full-stack developers featuring the latest trends in both frontend and backend technologies. Network with industry leaders and participate in hands-on coding sessions.
